title: Eagles hope, NFC South Post Draft, Tom Brady talks Tuck Rule, and Nate Burleson!
itunes:title: Eagles hope, NFC South Post Draft, Tom Brady talks Tuck Rule, and Nate Burleson!
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with the Eagles chances in the NFC East. Hosts Kay Adams, Peter Schrager, Tom Pelissero and 2x Super Bowl Champion Torrey Smith wonder if the Cowboys still have to be considered the division favorites.  The table examines improvements in the NFC South following the Draft before offering up teams that should have interest in WR Odell Beckham Jr.  Tom Brady takes over social media talking about the Tuck Rule and Nate Burleson drops by with his most underrated WR and top team in the AFC West!

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
